title: Python Conference (Pycon)
desc: Is an annual gathering of Python programming language users in Tanzania which includes software developers, data scientists, data analysts & techies from various organizations. The conference is organized by members of the Python Tanzania Users Group, a community dedicated to advancing the use of the Python language and technology in Tanzania.
cta: Join Us for One week of
cta_details: Workshops, technical presentations/talks, lightning talks, hackathons, research showcasing, community collaboration, and networking
team_desc: The PyCon Tanzania organizing committee team are experienced tech eco-system community members who have in the past, volunteered as organizers of various tech meetings beyond just the PyCon Tanzania event.
